sentences.en: Be in avian sensory in, most is the organ that degrades first?
sentences.cn: 在鸟类的感觉器官中, 最先退化的器官是?

sentences.en: But while cut motor nerves can be counted on to cause paralysis, sensory nerves are tricky.
sentences.cn: 然而,虽然可以指望以切断运动神经的方式造成麻痹,但是, 感觉神经却很难控制.

sentences.en: Changes in sensory perception are the most sensitive indicators of the presence of nitrogen dioxide.
sentences.cn: 感觉的改变是二氧化氮存在的最灵敏的标志.

sentences.en: For the genesis of its ideas mathematics gradually turned from the sensory to the intellectual faculties.
sentences.cn: 由于数学概念的起源,使它逐渐从感觉的学科转向思维的学科.

sentences.en: Human powers of sensory discrimination are limited.
sentences.cn: 人类感官分辨能力有限.

sentences.en: Marked sensory and motor changes are noted.
sentences.cn: 发现有显著的感觉和运动障碍.

sentences.en: Now, Carrie began to feel this in various sensory ways.
sentences.cn: 这时,通过各种感官印象, 嘉莉开始感觉到了这一点.

sentences.en: On his fingertips Joe has thousands of sensory nerve endings persquare inch.
sentences.cn: 在乔的手指尖上,每平方英寸的面积内有数以千计的感觉神经末梢.

sentences.en: The Greeks had recognized that abstract or mathematical space is distinct from sensory perceptions of space.
sentences.cn: 希腊人已经承认抽象的或数学的空间不同于感性认识的空间.

sentences.en: The sensory system may also undergo long - term adaptation in alien environments.
sentences.cn: 感觉系统对陌生的环境可能经过长时期才能适应.

sentences.en: The sensory system may undergo long-term adaptation in alien environments.
sentences.cn: 感觉系统对陌生的环境可能经过长时期才能适应。

sentences.en: The town marvels at his extra - sensory gifts.
sentences.cn: 全镇人无不对他的超感官功能感到惊奇.

sentences.en: The value of the exponent varies for different sensory modalities.
sentences.cn: 指数值随不同的灵敏速模式而变化.

sentences.en: These gases can also act as sensory irritants to produce tears or sneezing.
sentences.cn: 这些气体也可以起一种刺激物的作用,引起流泪或打喷嚏.

sentences.en: They rely on scent and sound primarily their sensory detection.
sentences.cn: 它们主要依靠嗅觉和听觉来感知世界.
